ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR ( agf__Release_Approved__c > TODAY(), agf__Chatter_Now_Signoff__c > TODAY(), agf__Dev_Mgr_Signoff__c > TODAY(), agf__Dev_VP_Signoff__c > TODAY(), agf__Development_Engineering_Signoff__c > TODAY(), agf__FFX_Signoff__c > TODAY(), agf__LiveAgent_Signoff__c > TODAY(), agf__M_M_Signoff__c > TODAY(), agf__OSC_Signoff__c > TODAY(), agf__OSC_Exec_Signoff__c > TODAY(), agf__PODSquad_PO_Signoff__c > TODAY(), agf__QE_Mgr_Signoff__c > TODAY(), agf__QE_VP_Signoff__c > TODAY(), agf__Release_Management_Signoff__c > TODAY(), agf__Release_Management_Exec_Signoff__c > TODAY(), agf__Sandbox_Signoff__c > TODAY(), agf__Search_Signoff__c > TODAY(), agf__Sites_Signoff__c > TODAY(), agf__Service_Delivery_TechOps_Signoff__c > TODAY(), agf__TBR_Signoff__c > TODAY(), agf__Technology_Exec_Signoff__c > TODAY(), agf__Technology_Products_Operations_Signoff__c > TODAY(), agf__TechOps_Eng_VP_Signoff__c > TODAY(), agf__TechOps_Operations_Signoff__c > TODAY())
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Signoff dates cannot be in the future.
